title: Strengthening AI Practical Competencies: Nonlinear System Observer Design: KKL Observer and Machine Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Foundations of control theory, nonlinear system modeling, state-space representation, basic machine learning concepts
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Explain the design principles of KKL observers in nonlinear systems and analyze the impact of time delays
Describe the design of observer chains using injective state transformations and the process of proving exponential stability
Implement neural network-based observer transformation coefficient estimation methods in a simulation environment
Quantitatively evaluate the impact of measurement delays/noise/learning errors on system observability performance
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
